content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task of enforcing administration policies and rules governing students as an elementary school teacher:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To enforce school policies and rules for students, I would:

- Clearly communicate expectations, policies and consequences to students at the beginning of the school year and provide periodic reminders
- Be consistent in enforcing rules and applying appropriate, proportional consequences for infractions 
- Use positive reinforcement to encourage and reward good behavior that follows the rules
- Lead by example by modeling appropriate conduct and respect for policies myself
- Partner with parents to ensure rules are understood and followed both at school and at home
- Handle rule violations calmly and respectfully through private conversations with students
- Escalate serious or repeated offenses to school administration when warranted
- Periodically review rules with students and modify my approach to enforcement as needed based on effectiveness
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
